nodes.text: Roya was a female Human who lived during the waning years of the Republic Classic era.

In 31 BBY, Roya worked as a member of a crew of a shuttle until the craft was rented by tourists in the Cularin system, and she helped to fly them from the city Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius to the moon Uffel. She spent the journey aboard the shuttle's flight deck, along with her fellow crew member, Jella.
